title: JUST IN: Barack Obama ARRESTED in a Japanese Drug Bust
text: JUST IN: Barack Obama ARRESTED in a Japanese Drug Bust BREAKING by admin - May 2, 2017 0 Share Tweet Former US President Barack Obama, in custody of the US military police, has informed on his drug dealing bosses, according to sources in Japanese military intelligence. As a result of this, an airplane filled with Afghan Heroin and North Korean amphetamines was impounded at Argyle International Airport on St. Vincent and the Grenadines in the Caribbean, the sources say. The money raised from this drug flight was intended to be used to finance the operations of Daesh (formerly known as ISIS), the sources say. This impoundment follows the capture of an Obama linked ship containing 4.2 tons of cocaine, the sources note. You can see the video below: This is the developing story. We will keep you updated soon. Share on Facebook Share Share on Twitter Tweet Share on Google Plus Share Share on Pinterest Share Share on LinkedIn Share Share on Digg Share
